post.text: "If a candidate regularly and flippantly makes cruel and insulting comments about women—about how we look, how we act—well, sadly, that's who that candidate really is." —Michelle Obama

comment.author: Whitney
comment.text: I wonder what Tim Kaine's vote on the veto override bill would have been. I wonder what is his and Hillary's stance on United States citizens who are victims of terrorism and their rights to sue Saudi Arabia. That would be an interesting question for all of these candidates to answer. We know where Obama stands Where do all of you stand?

replies.author: Kristina
replies.text: I know where trump stands for sure and I stand with him.
